name: Roll 20!
description:
Roll 20! is a simple and intuitive dice roller for your Apple Watch.

Quickly choose between D4, D6, D8, D10, D12, D20, or D100 dice and begin rolling.
You can also add custom modifiers to every roll or your roll total.

-------------

Please note:
Since this is a Watch only app it is sometimes not automatically installed.
To install it manually:
- go to the app store on your watch
- scroll down and tap Account
- then tap Purchased and install the app
